Class Model

java.lang.Object
Model
public class Model extends Object
Pictionary Model This class deals with the data to play pictionary
It loads data from word list files into arrays
It has methods to control server messaging and score data

Since:
2024-01-21

    • initializeHost

      public boolean initializeHost(String strNameField)
      Set up and connect socket after player enters name
      Parameters:
      strNameField - name inputted by user in text field
      Returns:
      a boolean of whether the host socket is connected and broadcasting the IP

    • getStatus

      public String getStatus()
      Gets the IP address, username, and length of player list
      Returns:
      a String with the IP address, username, and length splitted by commas

    • getPlayerList

      public String[][] getPlayerList()
      Gets the player list which includes IP address, username, and score
      Returns:
      a 2D String array with IP address, username, and score

    • getThemes

      public String[] getThemes()
      Gets a theme by reading the theme file
      Returns:
      a String array with the list of themes

      Determines whether a theme has been selected
      Parameters:
      intTheme - integer indicates which theme has been chosen
      Returns:
      a boolean indicating whether the user has chosen a theme

      Load objects of a theme from a text file
      Returns:
      a boolean of whether objects have been loaded properly

      public String getRandDrawer()
      Randomly choose a player to draw
      Returns:
      a String of a random player's IP address from the player list

    • getRandObjects

      public String[] getRandObjects()
      Randomly choose two different objects from the object list
      Drawer will have two options to choose from
      Returns:
      a String array with two objects

    • startGame

      public boolean startGame()
      Starts game if game is able to load objects from the text file
      Sets the round number to 1
      Returns:
      a boolean that indicates whether the objects could be loaded

    • newRound

      public boolean newRound()
      Choose random drawer and random objects
      Host sends message to clients
      Start timer for the drawer to choose an object
      Returns:
      a boolean that indicates whether the host is the drawer

    • startRound

      public void startRound()
      Allows drawer to start drawing
      Displays hint for the guessers
      Sets player points to 0

    • endRound

      public void endRound()
      Finishes the drawer's drawing turn
      Gives drawer points based on % of correct guesses

    • resetRound

      public boolean resetRound()
      Reset current drawing round for the next drawing round
      Returns:
      a boolean that indicates whether there will be a new drawing round

    • sendDrawData

      public void sendDrawData(int[] intDrawData)
      Host sends drawing data to clients
      Parameters:
      intDrawData - integer array for x position, y position, brush size, and brush colour

    • sendChatData

      public String sendChatData(String strIP, String strChatData)
      Host sends messages for drawing guesses and chat
      Parameters:
      strIP - IP address of the host
      strChatData - a guess or a message sent in the chat
      Returns:
      a String formatted according to chat telemetry

      Manipulates game data depending on the type of message

      Returns:
